title: When will Pixel 5a be launched globally and in India? Please do answer as it would mean a lot to me.
content:
Dear Google 

I am Shivam Keshri from Varanasi, India. I am willing to buy a compact smartphone. 

Recently, I got to know about the Pixel 5a. The moment I saw the size and the other specifications, it was like I am going to buy it in the very first sale in India. 
  
The purpose of this mail was to ask you if it is going to launch in India? Should I wait for it or look for other compact alternatives that will be launched in India?

Please do answer as it would mean a lot to me.

Hoping to hear from you soon. 

Love you, Google. 

Thank you.
